places.name: Great Wall of China
places.description: Ancient series of walls and fortifications located in northern China, built over several dynasties.

places.name: Colosseum
places.description: Large amphitheater in Rome, Italy, used for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles.

places.name: Machu Picchu
places.description: 15th-century Inca citadel in Peru, set high in the Andes Mountains.

places.name: Pyramids of Giza
places.description: Iconic ancient pyramids built as tombs for Egyptian pharaohs in Giza.

places.name: Stonehenge
places.description: Prehistoric monument in England consisting of a ring of standing stones.
